notex.app moduleÔÉÅ

notex.app.download_pdf()[source]ÔÉÅ

Downloads the compiled PDF for a given project.

Returns:

The requested PDF file if available, else an error JSON.

Return type:

Response

notex.app.get_latest_files(project_id)[source]ÔÉÅ

Retrieve the latest LaTeX and PDF files for a project.

Parameters:

project_id (str) ‚Äì Unique identifier for the project.

Returns:

Paths to the .tex and .pdf files if they exist, else (None, None).

Return type:

tuple

notex.app.get_project_folder(project_id)[source]ÔÉÅ

Get the directory path for a specific project.

Parameters:

project_id (str) ‚Äì Unique identifier for the project.

Returns:

Path to the project folder.

Return type:

str

notex.app.upload_file()[source]ÔÉÅ

Handles file uploads (PDFs or images) and converts them to LaTeX/PDF.

Returns:

JSON containing the project ID and the generated PDF path.

Return type:

Response

notex.config moduleÔÉÅ

notex.config.get_openai_clients()[source]ÔÉÅ

Module contentsÔÉÅ

Notex: A Python package for converting handwritten notes into LaTeX.

Provides: - PDF/Image to LaTeX conversion - Error correction for LaTeX - API for processing handwritten notes

Modules:

  • app: Flask API

  • config: Handles environment variables

  • src.Conversation: Core LaTeX processing

  • src.constants: LaTeX constants
